name: Flashman Gold
description:
Flashman Gold , arcade style one player platformer game, made with pasion for pixels, made for family, and children, playable from the age of 6 , all content is child friendly , and all content is build with the 80's in mind, for now you get 30 levels in a super nice design made of pixels and pixel based tiles.
The game it self : adventure, running, fast gameplay, arcade / pixel based style all come to getter in one game !
